Name: Broers
Review Text: I live very close and I love this place. For a coffee and cake or lunch with tea, whatever you want for a nice breakfast, lunch or afternoon break. The girls that are working here are so nice, positive, surprisingly friendly. I highly recommend it.

Name: Broers
Review Text: Great espresso, wonderful vibe for Sunday morning read and espresso and highly recommend. ‚Ä¶

Name: Broers
Review Text: Shame how the new owner stripped the once cozy cafe with comfortable seating, couches and sofas which was so well decorated into a cold and uncomfortable black and white interior. Coffee and food for takeaway or outside terrace is fine and ‚Ä¶

Name: Broers
Review Text: Nice interior design, even has standing tables.  Good coffee and cakes, vegan friendly.

Name: Broers
Review Text: Super nice home setting, extremely moist carrot cake (quite possibly the best in Amsterdam) great coffee. Definitely a good recommendation and will be coming back for sure!

Name: Broers
Review Text: During our journey in Amsterdam accidentally we saw cafe Broers. This place looks very cozy, arouses interest and enough local. We had breakfast at once and then decided that every morning till end of trip will begin in this place. ‚Ä¶

Name: Broers
Review Text: Oh man. So chilll hier. Nice vibe, cool people actual good service (and yes we are still in amsterdam. So that's very special)  always good music and not too loud. Happy people, just happy people

Name: Broers
Review Text: Really nice spot for a long breakfast while reading a book :). The breakfast menu had a bit too much bread though, would love some yoghurt and fruit.

Name: Broers
Review Text: very nice place and Fatou is an amazing person. I recommend this place & the banana cake !

Name: Broers
Review Text: How is this place so highly rated? I keep trying as I live right next door but every time the coffee is expensive and terribly made. The staff clearly have had no training whatsoever and don‚Äôt have a clue what they are doing.

Name: Broers
Review Text: Best place for breakfast or a nice brunch. I love their avocado toast.

Name: Broers
Review Text: A great family place to have your weekends brunch. The service is perfect, truly nice people working there.

Name: Broers
Review Text: Nice place. Delicious chai latte. Friendly staff.

Name: Broers
Review Text: Lovely decor.....good vibe..menu a little limited

Name: Broers
Review Text: Really cute spot! The decoration makes you feel at home and the service is friendly if not somewhat slow. The food was good and the coffee too, however to the pricy side. I would totally come to study or work with my laptop it definitely has the vibe for that.

Name: Broers
Review Text: Best coffee in years - how can I get it again in the UK? Lovely friendly staff, and fresh tasty food... they even cooked a fresh croissant for me on the spot ! In the late July 2018 heat wave, they provided a paddling pool for customers to put their feet into - clever stuff.

Name: Broers
Review Text: Lovely place during the day, enjoyable atmosphere a one of the best apple taart we ever had! Love it üëçüëç sandwiches at lunch are also very nice. Have not tried at night but the gin&tonic selection seems to be a top one!

Name: Broers
Review Text: Lovely staff! We spent a nice Saturday afternoon here and they were very patient in teaching my friends Dutch üëçüèºüëçüèº

Name: Broers
Review Text: Cosy place with variety of seating options (e.g. lounge if you want an extension of your living room, terrace for sun). Friendly service, love coming here for a drink. Carrot cake is also a winner!

Name: Broers
Review Text: Such a great place to sit down and have a great cup of coffee. Great vibe, nice music and of course great coffee. A good place to sit and work or relax on the couch.

Name: Broers

Name: Broers

Name: Broers

Name: Broers

Name: Broers

Name: Broers
